Question: A five-time Grammy Award winner, this person was inducted into the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame in 2000.
Hints: The album also gave this person his first Grammy since JT, when he was honored with Best Pop Album in 1998.
Gorilla was followed in 1976 by In the Pocket, this person's last studio album to be released under Warner Bros.
Flanked by two greatest hit releases, this person's Platinum-certified October Road appeared in 2002 to a receptive audience.
